hymn.title: I heard the voice of Jesus say
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Satisfied with Christ

layout.singingstanza: I heard the voice of Je -- sus say, "Come un -- to Me, and rest; Lay down, thou wea -- ry one, lay down Thy head up -- on My breast." I came to Je -- sus as I was, Wea -- ry, and worn, and sad; I found in Him a rest -- ing -- place, And He has made me glad.

lyrics.stanza: I heard the voice of Jesus say, "Come unto Me, and rest; Lay down, thou weary one, lay down Thy head upon My breast." I came to Jesus as I was, Weary, and worn, and sad; I found in Him a resting-place, And He has made me glad.

I heard the voice of Jesus say, "Behold, I freely give The living water: thirsty one, Stoop down, and drink, and live." I came to Jesus, and I drank Of that life-giving stream; My thirst was quenched, my soul revived, And now I live in Him.

I heard the voice of Jesus say, "I am this dark world's Light; Look unto Me, thy morn shall rise, And all thy day be bright." I looked to Jesus, and I found In Him my Star, my Sun; And in that Light of life I'll walk Till trav'lling days are done.
